title: Run Out module configuration for the stop feature

stop.description: Parameters for emergency stop behavior when detecting a collision.

on_time_buffer.description: [s] Successive collision detection time required to start the stopping decision.

off_time_buffer.description: [s] Successive non-collision detection time required to remove a stopping decision.

distance_buffer.description: [m] Longitudinal safety distance to keep between ego and the collision position.
